2.2.10. Lab – Modifying Radius Configurations¶

2.2.10.1. Task – Modifying the Radius Server secret password¶

  1. Click Local Traffic >> iRules >> Data Group List

  2. Click ephemeral_config

  3. Change the Radius Secret - Highlight RADIUS_SECRET in the String Records window - Click Edit

  4. Change the Value from radius_secret to secret

  5. Click ADD, and Click

2.2.10.2. Task – Modifying the BIG-IP radius secret¶

  1. SSH into the BIG-IP and enter traffic manangement shell by typing tmsh

  2. Enter the following commands

    modify auth radius-server system_auth_name1 secret secret
save sys config
